entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is mentioned as a group of people who have arrived at the hideout. The text states that it was originally smaller and only had Gryffindor hangings.

entities.name: d.a.
entities.description: D.A. (Death Eaters) is mentioned as a group of people who have arrived at the hideout. The text states that it has expanded as more and more of the D.A. have arrived.

entities.name: carrows
entities.description: Carrows are mentioned as a group of people who cannot get into the hideout. The text states that Harry is looking around for the door to prevent them from getting in.

relationships.description: The hideout has expanded as more and more of the D.A. have arrived, but it originally had Gryffindor hangings.
Carrows cannot get into the hideout.
